screen:
-= Info about function 'ENUMLOOKUP' =-
[Syntax] ENUMLOOKUP(number[,Method-type[,options[,record#[,zone-suffix]]]])
[Synopsis] General or specific querying of NAPTR records for ENUM or ENUM-like DNS pointers
[Description] Option 'c' returns an integer count of the number of NAPTRs of a certain RR type. Combination of 'c' and Method-type of 'ALL' will return a count of all NAPTRs for the record. Option 'u' returns the full URI and does not strip off the URI-scheme. Option 's' triggers ISN specific rewriting Option 'i' looks for branches into an Infrastructure ENUM tree Option 'd' for a direct DNS lookup without any flipping of digits Defaults are: Method-type=sip, no options, record=1, zone-suffix=e164.arpa
For more information, see doc/asterisk.pdf
